resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text:
本道ハ夏率馬車　通セズ

乾燥機ハ天候好条件ノ際辛ウジテ馬ヲ通ズ

迂回路ヲ求メ得ズ又虚々湿地アリテ荷物ハ人力ヲ以テ運搬スルヲ要ス

This main road is impassable for horse-drawn carriages in summer.

During the dry season, under favorable weather conditions, horses can barely pass. There is no alternative route, and due to marshy areas, cargo must be transported manually.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text:
四排ー西通間
乾燥期辛ウジテ輕車輛ノ通過ヲ許スモ雨期ニ放テハ沼道到ル虚大湿地ト化シ交通壮絶ス凍結期ハ江上？道ヲ利用シ本道ヲ利用スルモノナシ
Between Sipai and Xitong, passage for light vehicles is barely possible during the dry season. However, in the rainy season, the road turns into a marshy path, transforming into an extensive wetland, making transportation extremely difficult. During the freezing season, the river route is used, and no one utilizes this main road.
resource.chars:

Between Sipai and Xitong, passage for light vehicles is barely possible during the dry season. However, in the rainy season, the road turns into a marshy path, transforming into an extensive wetland, making transportation extremely difficult. During the freezing season, the river route is used, and no one utilizes this main road.

密林

西洋杉ヲ主トシ樅「ビーフタ」等下枝繁茂セル樹木及倒木多ク通視困難ナリ軍隊徒歩兵ノ外通過困難

 

Dense Forest
Predominantly composed of Western red cedar, fir ('bifuta'), and other trees with thick undergrowth and abundant fallen logs, making visibility difficult. Passage is challenging except for infantry on foot.

<span id="docs-internal-guid-c84dbcff-7fff-fad9-04f2-19c7969ec1c1"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #cc0000; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">西洋杉樅「ビーフタ」等ヲ主トシ中<span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: #cc0000; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">经<span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #cc0000; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">三〇種程度ナリ又樹下二灌木葡萄等繁茂シ倒木アリテ軍<span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #cc0000; background-color: #fff2cc; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">隊<span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #cc0000; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">徒歩兵以外ノ通過困難ナリ。
<span id="docs-internal-guid-c84dbcff-7fff-fad9-04f2-19c7969ec1c1"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #cc0000; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">The Dense Forest
<span id="docs-internal-guid-c84dbcff-7fff-fad9-04f2-19c7969ec1c1"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #cc0000; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">It primarily consists of western cedar, fir, and approximately 30 other species. Additionally, under the trees, shrubs and grapevines grow abundantly, and fallen trees make passage difficult for any troops other than foot soldiers.
resource.chars:
密林

西洋杉樅「ビーフタ」等ヲ主トシ中经三〇種程度ナリ又樹下二灌木葡萄等繁茂シ倒木アリテ軍隊徒歩兵以外ノ通過困難ナリ。

The Dense Forest

It primarily consists of western cedar, fir, and approximately 30 other species. Additionally, under the trees, shrubs and grapevines grow abundantly, and fallen trees make passage difficult for any troops other than foot soldiers.

Dense forest: Predominantly composed of Western red cedar, mixed with fir ('Beefuta') and other tree species. The branches are thick, and there is an abundance of miscellaneous trees, making visibility difficult. Military, except for foot soldiers, find passage difficult.
